content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the bathroom stall in this query description: "The smallest bathroom stall". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The smallest bathroom stall can be identified by comparing the size of the stalls visible in each view. In view 2, the stalls are clearly visible, and the smallest one is located on the right side of the image. This view provides a clear perspective of the relative sizes of the stalls, making it easier to identify the smallest one.
